Text: Will never be able to say thank you to you enough for all of the Christmas movies!

Hey I know you already downloaded some for me but do you have a movie called The Three Gifts?  It was on last night and will be airing in a few days.  I can't find it anywhere.  If possible could you please add:

1.)  The Three Gifts
2.)  Ebbie (miracle at Christmas) 1995
3.)  Our First Christmas 

Thank you so much!!!
You have been busy, thank you so much.

Hey RayCort.
Every movie you do is wonderful. I think I have downloaded every single movie that you have done.
My favorite movie of all time is OUR FIRST CHRISTMAS. It will be on Hallmark Dec 20th and Dec 21st. Maybe you could make me a very happy person. Thanks so much
Hi raycort do you happen to have christmas at water's edge?

Thank you so much RayCort, I live in Canada and don't get the Hallmark channel here............thanks to you I got all the movies I ever wanted..........could you please maybe upload the Hollywood Christmas Parade too.........I believe it aired yesterday and supposedly will air a few more times this month, thank you so much for all your help!!
I love Our First Christmas as well.  Raycort said he would upload it once it airs.  I am looking forward to it.  I truly love that movie.

thanks, another good one
